text: Mahamadou Diarra (born 18 May 1981) is a Malian former professional footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. He served as captain for the Mali national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals OFI 1998–99 Alpha Ethniki 21 2 1 0 — — — 22 2 Vitesse 1999–2000 Eredivisie 16 2 1 0 — 1Appearances in UEFA Cup 0 — 18 2 2000–01 29 4 3 0 — 2 0 — 34 4 2001–02 24 3 4 0 — — — 28 3 Total 69 9 8 0 — 3 0 — 80 9 Lyon 2002–03 Ligue 1 28 1 2 0 1 0 7Five appearances in UEFA Champions League and two in UEFA Cup 0 1Appearance in Trophée des Champions 0 39 1 2003–04 27 1 0 0 0 0 10Appearances in UEFA Champions League 0 1 1 38 2 2004–05 33 2 1 0 3 1 9 2 — 46 5 2005–06 31 3 1 0 1 0 9 2 1 0 43 5 2006–07 4 0 — — — — 4 0 Total 123 7 4 0 5 1 35 4 3 1 170 13 Real Madrid 2006–07 La Liga 33 3 4 0 — 10 1 — 47 4 2007–08 30 0 0 0 — 6 0 2Appearances in Supercopa de España 0 38 0 2008–09 9 0 1 0 — 3 0 2 0 15 0 2009–10 15 0 2 0 — 3 0 — 20 0 2010–11 3 0 3 0 — 2 0 — 8 0 Total 90 3 10 0 — 24 1 4 0 128 4 Monaco 2010–11 Ligue 1 9 0 — — — — 9 0 Fulham 2011–12 Premier League 11 1 — — — — 11 1 2012–13 8 0 0 0 0 0 — — 8 0 2013–14 4 0 — — — — 4 0 Total 23 1 0 0 0 0 — — 23 1 Career total 335 22 23 0 5 1 62 5 7 1 432 29 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Mali 1998 1 0 1999 1 0 2000 2 0 2001 3 0 2002 11 2 2003 8 0 2004 10 2 2005 3 1 2006 2 0 2007 7 1 2008 10 1 2009 3 0 2010 7 0 2011 3 0 2012 1 0 Total 72 7 :Scores and results list Mali's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Diarra goal.
